p: The differences of the single clinical parameters (FMBS, FMPS, PD level ≥ 5 mm, CAL ≥ 4 mm) were evaluated ( Cosyn et al., 2013). For the same clinical score, the difference between TG and CG was carried out using the Mann–Whitney U test both at T0 and T1 ( p < 0.05). Within each group, the differences in all clinical scores between T0 and T1 were evaluated using the Wilcoxon signed-rank test ( p < 0.05). The difference in the rate of adverse events between the two groups were evaluated using the Fisher exact test for each time period.
